EmailTemplate.name: Executive Briefing New York.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Executive Session | Considerations for Cloud Architectures
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Executive Session: Practical Considerations for Cloud Architectures Executive Session: Practical Considerations for Cloud Architectures
VMTurbo is sponsoring an informal dialog about cloud in the enterprise, and we'd like to add your voice.
Thursday, February 20
5:30PM - 7:30PM
230 Fifth Bar - 230 5th Ave @ 27th St, New York
RSVP Today - http://bit.ly/1itmZvR
Enterprises are adopting elements of the software defined datacenter to improve agility and contain costs as they move toward private, public, and hybrid cloud architectures.
Columbia professor Yechiam Yemini - whose expertise is in distributed systems - will be hosting a session on practical considerations for cloud architectures.
We'll also be raffling an Xbox One and a PlayStation 4. Space is limited, so please RSVP today.
Sincerely, VMTurbo
Space is limited - http://bit.ly/1hkhpeh Featured Speaker Yechiam Yemini
